description.value: The Dropwater Strides. As it Strides, it may pass through a creature's space during this movement. Any creature whose space the Dropwater passes through must succeed on a @Check[fortitude|dc:14|basic] saving throw or take @Damage[1d4[bludgeoning]] and be knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.
